Just wondering if anyone knows of any mods that have a command pod with a 4-crew max capacity? Preferably stock-alike and with IVA. I know that the stock space shuttle-like pod is a 4-crew pod, but I'm looking for something like a capsule to put on a rocket. I searched the forum, but only found one such mod.

I like the look of Lithobrake Exploration Technologies's pod, but I'm wondering what else is out there. Thanks in advance!
Pretty sure Near Future and Stockalike Station Parts both have some assortment of jumbo-sized pods, though I don't think either have completed IVA yet.

Technically, you could just edit whatever command pod you like to have 4 crew space, Iva might be a problem though. However, if you do this I suggest copying the original and editing the copy so that you can tell which is which.

How to edit a part:

Ksp directory - Gamedata - Squad - Parts - Command - Whichever part you chose duplicate it - go into the text file - Change crew capacity and the part name - Press save - restart ksp

Warning proceed with caution!

There's always the hitchhiker ...

... I completely forgot about the hitchhiker:blush:

The Hitchhiker isn't a CP, though. It can't be controlled without a probe core, has a low crash tolerance, doesn't carry monopropellant or electricity, doesn't have reaction wheels, and isn't aerodynamic.
Near Future Spacecraft has a PPD-Whatever with 6 slots, and Necrobones was showing screenshots of a 4-man pod in one of his upcoming mods as I recall.

Yep, I saw Necrobone's pod. It looks pretty good I think, but doesn't have IVA yet. Just wondering if it's the first of its kind or if another mod has a 4-crew capsule as well.
